files.description: Deterministic, CLI-driven pipeline entrypoint that regenerates all expected artifacts (including outputs/index.md) with stable schemas/formats and optional CI-friendly flags.
Artifact generation utilities that write roadmap, bibliography, coverage matrix, results.json, figure.png, and test logs deterministically to a target output directory.
Manifest management module that defines the canonical artifact list, renders outputs/index.md, and parses it for test assertions.
Artifact manifest markdown that lists every expected pipeline output file and serves as the canonical checklist for CI tests.
End-to-end test that runs the pipeline and asserts every file listed in outputs/index.md exists (and is reproducibly generated) for CI/CD gating.
CI workflow that installs dependencies, runs the pipeline deterministically, and executes tests asserting the manifest-listed artifacts exist.

missionDescription: Create ./outputs/index.md that lists every expected artifact (roadmap, bib, coverage matrix, results.json, figure.png, test logs) and update scripts/run_pipeline.py to regenerate them deterministically; add tests that assert the manifest-listed files exist.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Enforcing one entrypoint, one test runner, one ./outputs folder, and an ./outputs/index.md manifest reduces integration complexity and makes auditing (what ran, what was produced) straightforward and ...
projectName: ./outputs/index.md that lists every expected artifact (roadmap, bib, coverage matrix, results.json, figure.png, test logs) and update
